title: Your BMI Guarantee is waiting to be claimed!

dialog.title: Are you sure you want to {{acceptance}} the BMI Guarantee?
dialog.description: If you decline the BMI guarantee, you are choosing not to receive the guarantee offered and it will be cancelled.

description: We are pleased to confirm that a new BMI Guarantee is available for you to claim, to provide peace of mind and protection for your property and its occupants.
This guarantee offer is available for a limited period, so please review the details below and click to accept or decline this offer.
guaranteeConditionsDescription: By clicking on the ‘Accept’ button at the bottom of this page, you accept this guarantee and declare to have carefully read and to specifically approve the following provisions:
acceptanceTitle: Please confirm below to either accept or reject the BMI guarantee offer
acceptanceDescription: If you choose to accept, then the guarantee documentation will follow in a separate email, together with a full copy of the terms and conditions.
If you choose to reject, then the guarantee offer will be cancelled and your roofing contractor will be notified

acceptance.label: By checking this box I confirm that I have read and understood the guarantee conditions.

confirmation.title: Thank you for choosing BMI to cover your roof!
description: We work closely with roofing contractors to ensure you receive the highest standards of workmanship, enhanced guarantees and the continued support and services you need to keep your roof in the best possible condition.
For further information about BMI and if you need to get in touch, please visit {{website}}
